remarks: The unit scalar of the dual of a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ldual1.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldual1.u $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
ldual1.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldual1.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` D ) $.
ldual1.i $e |- I = ( 1r ` S ) $.
ldual1.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldual1 $p |- ( ph -> I = .1. ) $.
